subject: Where do I start???
msgSnippet: Hello every Body: I am new to JUnit but not to java. I am writing a client/server application. I have heared alot about JUnit bu tnever used it extensivly. Now
messageBody:
Hello every Body:
I am new to JUnit but not to java. I am writing a client/server
application. I have heared alot about JUnit bu tnever used it
extensivly. Now i need to automate the testing for the components but
,I don't know where to start. I have many components that I need to
test, and the worst part, alot of this components are related to
sockets. Any link to a tutorial or a book will be a great help.
